items.description: Herrenes stafettlag er klart. TV 2s ekspert kaller det en gledelig overraskelse.

items.title: NRK-ekspert kritisk til Iversen-valget på stafetten: – Større risiko

items.title: B1ad3 on deciding against changes: "We believed that this season we would have a lot of potential to be a trophy contender"
items.description: NAVI's coach explained why the team opted against roster changes in the last off-season, and how the removal of Train has dampened their heightened expectations early in the new season.

items.title: Kirkeeide med maktdemonstrasjon på sprinten: – Dama er gal!
items.description: ANTERSELVA (TV 2): Maren Kirkeeide med maktdemonstrasjon på sprinten. For det blir hun hyllet fra «alle» hold.

items.title: Hyller Kirkeeides gullgrep: – Taktisk genistrek
items.description: En eventyrlig avslutning ga Maren Kirkeeides aller første OL-gull. Ekspertene mener et annet trekk også bidro.

items.title: Braathen wins Brazil's first ever Winter Olympic medal with giant slalom gold
items.description: Alpine Skier Lucas Pinheiro Braathen wins Brazil's first ever medal at the Winter Olympics with gold in the men's giant slalom.

items.title: The samba-dancing skier making Brazil Olympic history
items.description: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen makes history for Brazil by clinching his nation's first Winter Olympic medal with gold in the giant slalom.

items.title: 'She's running with the ski under her arm' - Sweden survive crash chaos to win silver
items.description: Sweden claim an incredible silver medal as Frida Karlsson completes a heroic comeback after Ebba Andersson crashed and lost one of her skis in the women's cross-country ski final.

items.title: Australia's Anthony wins gold as rivals crash out in chaotic moguls
items.description: Australia's Jakara Anthony becomes the first ever women's dual moguls Olympic champion, beating the Team USA duo of Jaelin Kauf and Elizabeth Lemley into silver and bronze.

items.title: 'Absolutely brilliant' -  Morrison's best shots against Canada
items.description: Watch the best shots from Rebecca Morrison during Great Britain's 7-6 victory over world champions Canada in the women's curling at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

items.title: Bekreftet: Igor Tudor leder Tottenham ut sesongen
items.description:
Tottenham henter inn kroaten Igor Tudor (47) som midlertidig manager. Han trente Juventus tidligere i sesongen.
Løsningen bekreftes i Tottenhams mediekanaler.

items.title: Sverige reagerer

items.title: Svensk stjerne knust etter drama: – Et mareritt
items.description: Ebba Andersson var knust etter svensk stafettsølv. Utøverne ble advart i forkant om krevende forhold i OL-løypa.
